Author: thorben_61995
Content: The precheck on platform.wafer.space is running at least 30 minutes faster (on a 4 to 5 hour check) compared to an AWS EC2 c6a.4xlarge instance. I will try to get more accurate numbers.

Author: mithro_
Content: @Thorben - That is a useful comparison! The prechecker machines are 2 * Hetzner EX63 with Intel Core Ultra 7 265 (Arrow Lake) and 20 (8 Performance + 12 Efficiency) cores with 192GB of memory.
